start.speaker: rowena
start.text: No coffee? This can't be happening...

doctor1.speaker: doctor
doctor1.text: Ah! Rowena Pitifool! What keeps you going? Your cherished coffee, the faithful companion in your... dry spells. Oh, the trials your... profession must face!

rowena1.speaker: rowena
rowena1.text: Doc, you are my nightmare. You know I can't wake up without it.

rowena2.speaker: rowena
rowena2.text: Just like you, this is a disaster, Doc. You know I need my coffee.

rowena3.speaker: rowena
rowena3.text: Doc, my nemesis. Can't you be helpful for once?

doctor2.speaker: doctor
doctor2.text: Yes, your vital elixir. Always there to fill that void in your... muff.

doctor3.speaker: doctor
doctor3.text: Yes, your vital elixir. Always there to fill that void in your... hoo-ha.

doctor4.speaker: doctor
doctor4.text: Helpful? My dear, I'm the voice of reason in your chaotic life. How about finding a solution for your coffee dilemma?

rowena4.speaker: rowena
rowena4.text: Please, not this again. I just need my coffee.

rowena5.speaker: rowena
rowena5.text: Do you have any useful suggestions, or just sarcasm?

rowena7.speaker: rowena
rowena7.text: Please, not this again. I just need my coffee.

doctor5.speaker: doctor
doctor5.text: Oh, come now, Rowena. There's no need to be touchy. I'm just here to lend suggestive... remarks.

doctor6.speaker: doctor
doctor6.text: Useful? My dear, I'm the voice of reason in your chaotic life. How about finding a solution for your coffee dilemma?

doctor7.speaker: doctor
doctor7.text: I'm OK with that as it makes your misery so entertaining. Now, what's your plan, caffeine junkie?

rowena9.speaker: rowena
rowena9.text: You won't help me, will you?

rowena10.speaker: rowena
rowena10.text: And I want you to stop that. I hate it when you make those comments about my... Well, you know.

rowena11.speaker: rowena
rowena11.text: Sarcasm won't get me my coffee.

doctor8.speaker: doctor
doctor8.text: True, but it makes your misery more entertaining. Now, whatâ€™s your plan, caffeine junkie?

doctor9.speaker: doctor
doctor9.text: My dear, it's not my fault if your love life is as barren as your coffee cupboard. But enough about that, let's focus on the task at hand, shall we?

rowena12.speaker: rowena
rowena12.text: Maybe I should find a new imaginary friend.

doctor10.speaker: doctor
doctor10.text: Good luck with that. I'm irreplaceable. Now, about that coffee...

rowena13.speaker: rowena
rowena13.text: You're right. I do need to focus.

doctor11.speaker: doctor
doctor11.text: You'd better, I suppose, yes. So, what's your plan, caffeine junkie?

rowena14.speaker: rowena
rowena14.text: I can't believe I'm arguing with a voice in my head.

doctor12.speaker: doctor
doctor12.text: Ah, the existential crisis begins! But let's save the philosophy for later. Now, about that coffee...

doctor13.speaker: doctor
doctor13.text: Oh, Rowena. No need to get your froth all steamed up. I'm just here to offer my ever-so-helpful... insights.

rowena16.speaker: rowena
rowena16.text: I'll find a way, just you watch.

rowena17.speaker: rowena
rowena17.text: I guess I'll start looking here, in the kitchen.

rowena18.speaker: rowena
rowena18.text: I don't have a plan, that's why I'm talking to you.

doctor15.speaker: doctor
doctor15.text: You know we could make it last all day long, right?

rowena19.speaker: rowena
rowena19.text: I need more than just vague advice.

doctor14.speaker: doctor
doctor14.text: Vague advice? My dear, I'm the epitomy of clarity. But fine, if you want specifics, start by looking in the kitchen. You might be surprised by what you find.

rowena20.speaker: rowena
rowena20.text: Maybe I should write down your sarcastic suggestions.

rowena21.speaker: rowena
rowena21.text: Can't you just tell me where to look?

rowena22.speaker: rowena
rowena22.text: I hate it when you make those comments about my... Well, you know.

doctor15.speaker: doctor
doctor15.text: Then you'll have to get creative, won't you? It's not like you have a plan anyway.

doctor16.speaker: doctor
doctor16.text: An excellent idea! My wisdom deserves to be immortalized. Now, shall we find that coffee?

doctor17.speaker: doctor
doctor17.text: Ah, but where would the fun be in that? Exploration is half the journey, my dear. Start with the obvious and work your way to the obscure.

doctor18.speaker: doctor
doctor18.text: Oh, I'm sure you'll find something delightful in there. After all, necessity is the mother of invention... and perhaps a little bit of desperation, too.

rowena24.speaker: rowena
rowena24.text: I'll try to ignore your commentary and concentrate on finding coffee.

doctor19.speaker: doctor
doctor19.text: Suit yourself, Rowena. Just remember, I'm always here to spice up your inner monologues.
